itemDescription: British physician and academic, specialising in type 1 diabetes

wikipedia_page.main: Stephanie Anne Amiel,  (born 17 October 1954) is a British physician and academic, specialising in type 1 diabetes. Since 1995, she has been the R. D. Lawrence Professor of Diabetic Medicine at King's College London and a consultant at King's College Hospital.

link_mentions.page: Barts and The London School of Medicine and Dentistry

response: * Stephanie Amiel (born 1954), British physician and academic

Alberti first married in 1964 and had three sons with his first wife. In 1998, he married Stephanie Amiel.'ALBERTI, Sir (Kurt) George (Matthew Mayer)', Who's Who 2017, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2017; online edn, Oxford University Press, 2016; online edn, Nov 2016 accessed 17 Oct 2017
